mapper.select: SELECT UPJONG_L_NM upNm, COUNT(UPJONG_L_CD) upCnt FROM ( SELECT T1.UPJONG_L_CD, T1.UPJONG_L_NM, to_char(to_date(T2.up_date, 'mm-dd-yyyy'), 'yyyymm') DAY FROM TRA_CODE T1 INNER JOIN TRA_DATE T2 ON T1.UPJONG_S_CD = T2.UPJONG_S_CD ORDER BY UPJONG_L_CD ASC ) T2 WHERE DAY = '201806' GROUP BY UPJONG_L_NM
